QM_12x70_AP description: Everyone likes high pen ammo, right? Well this one is not hard to come by, but still. You prove to me that you can obtain it without my help and that you are proficient with this caliber regardless of the map, enemy you fighting or distance and I'll let you buy it from my stock.
QM_12x70_AP successMessageText: Well now you at least have proper ammo
